p: The RGRs of L. minor were 0.422, 0.133, and 0.073 g/g/day in first, second, and third harvest times, respectively (Figure 9D). The duckweed was first harvested after 10 days of introduction. Macrophyte was harvested thrice during 1 month culture period. Fifty percent macrophyte was harvested at the time of first and second harvesting and all plants were collected at the time of third harvest. The production of L. minor was 1.17 Â± 0.005 Kg/m 2/month (Figure 10D). Total production of duckweed in the pond was 702.5 Kg/ha/month (dry weight).
